artist: Utagawa Kunisada Published by Kagaya Yasubei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of a man holding a toothpick, wearing a black kimono with subtle floral patterning, open at the chest, and a light blue cloth with white text over his PL shoulder; landscape in background with mountain in ULQ and river with three figures in a long boat; red text cartouche in URC with sword, net and basket at edges of cartouche
marks: Signature and Seal in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Toda River Near Itabashi and Amiboshi Samojirō
